entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -15.4°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -19.1°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
